title: Banned for Using Third Party Software

embed.description: Aretrix / Diamond 3 42LP / 37W 30L Win Ratio 55% / Lucian - 9W 5L Win Ratio 64%, Twisted Fate - 5W 4L Win Ratio 56%, Aurelion Sol - 6W 2L Win Ratio 75%, Vayne - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Jinx - 3W 1L Win Ratio 75%

body:
About 24 hours ago I received a perma ban for apparently exploiting the game,  although all I have ever used while playing is skype and  teamspeak with the people that I play with, and the occasional spotify music in the background.
This ban comes at a horrible time as im grinding for several hours of the day in diamond 3, i've link my op.gg profile for you all to see my match history, it really isn't much proof but i recently went on a 5 game tilt a few days ago, but overall nothing that would deem me a player using exploits?
not to mention i barely have any programs on my laptop anyways, because i was forced to wipe my laptop clean a few weeks ago due to a malware or adware virus.
i've also included a link to screenshots of my current list of programs, http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Aretrix
and as you can see most of them were installed at around the same time a little under a month ago.
I would also like to include that the only change i have ever done to the league of legends files is of the CFG folder, where i changed my "left click" to "attack move click", but as i've researched before making the change this actually legal and even some pro players have done this. e.g. doublelift

I have gone ahead and sent a ticket to support and have received the typical 
> I cannot disclose any details regarding our investigation as we don't want to compromise our future investigations. However, if you're sharing your account information with anyone else, that would be a violation of our Terms of Use and can cause your account to be detected as well.

Any recommendations on what i should do now?

replies.body:
Good, and don't return, filthy cheater.

Like all cheaters you will deny it, good job riot cleaning up the scum.
